analyst_notes: APT group with nation-state backing. Recent uptick in reconnaissance activity against defense industrial base. CISA alert 2024-01 references this actor.
Third-party software component identified with backdoor capability. Affects 12 programs of record. Coordinating with DCSA for remediation.
GPS spoofing and jamming incidents increasing 23% month-over-month. New waveform countermeasures in testing.
No specific threat identified. Heightened vigilance due to recent IC-wide incidents. Additional CI awareness training scheduled.
Adversary reconnaissance of NATO infrastructure observed. Coordinating with host nation partners on defensive measures.
Spear-phishing campaign targeting DoD contractors. CACI-specific lures observed. Mandatory training pushed to all staff.
Adversary SIGINT capabilities assessed as improving. Reviewed encryption protocols and updated COMSEC procedures.
Active disinformation narratives detected targeting allied populations. Coordinating with DoS GEC on response.
New procurement network identified. Tracking 3 new facilitation nodes. Shared with interagency partners.
Identified new cryptocurrency mixing services being used to evade sanctions. Coordinating with FinCEN and FBI.
